entry.title: Sunday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending this evening then snow. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 30 before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow at times before morning. Wind north 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023
